title: HELP, CAN'T LEAVE "ACTIVE" GAME = WON GAME BUT END GAME LOBBY DIDN'T SHOW

replies.body: It's fixed for me now! I can log in and play, but I didn't get the win for the game that I was in.
Wow, looks not only me has that problem. Riot please fix it.
RIOT I JUST WON A RANKED GAME THAT WAS GOING TO GIVE ME PROMOS AND ITS NOW GONE?!?! ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME?!

> RIOT I JUST WON A RANKED GAME THAT WAS GOING TO GIVE ME PROMOS AND ITS NOW GONE?!?! ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME?!

You all need to chill the hell out.  Its a damn video game not LIFE you won't die OMG.  And quit saying "riot fix riot fix" like they are gonna drop everything they are doing this sec and drop down to your needs and fix it and if they do fix it (Which they will) it will take more then just a few mins prob a few hours knowing riot.  In short its just a video game go get a life being off the game for a few hours or maybe the rest of the night isn't gonna KILL YOU.

****Same thing happened to me last night. Win would have given me my promo series. My match history in the pvp.net client doesn't show the match but my full match history on the website does. I put in a ticket last night.

Hey there, thanks for bringing your issue to the Help and Support boards!

It looks like there was an issue with the servers earlier tonight, causing some players to be stuck at this reconnect screen. This sometimes happens when the server thinks you're still in a game when you aren't and is commonly referred to as a "ghost game." While there isn't anything you can do personally to resolve this issue yourself, it does go away when the server updates the status of your account (which can take upwards of an hour sometimes).

I would say, give the servers time to update after the issue that disconnected some players earlier and see if your match history is accurate afterwards. I can't personally guarantee that you will receive the LP you earned for that match or not since I'm not a Rioter and I don't have access to the internal tools they all use. But I can say that your account won't be stuck like this forever, just give it time to update.

Similar issue. I'm not stuck in client. I actually closed my client a few hours ago after stats didn't come up, but I played a game a few hours ago as Blitzcrank and now I'm dealing with this screen. I used lolnexus.com to check if i was in a game still, but they reported that I wasn't. Help? My summoner name is shanekeen.

lolnexus : http://www.lolnexus.com/NA/search?name=shanekeen&region=NA

RIOT.
NO GAME IS IN MY HISTORY. ARE YOU KDDING ME
Upvote this and the other posts about the same issue so that it gets more visibility.
I have the exact same problem.
